author: craigmcc
msg: Add an enhanced Developer's Guide for the digester package, in the form
of a "package.html" file that will be included in the JavaDoc

author: craigmcc
msg: When processing an ActionForward that has the redirect property set, correctly
apply URL rewriting so that session state is maintained even if cookies are

author: craigmcc
msg: Correctly make the loop control variable that is exposed be visible only within
the nested scope of this tag.  As a side effect, this also means that it will
be correctly updated as the iteration occurs, which works around problems in
the generated code of some JSP containers.

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct a flaw in the TLD for the <logic:iterate> tag.  Previously, the
tag extra info class for this tag was not documented, so the JSP page compiler
would not expose the loop variable as a scripting element for use inside the
tag.  This has now been corrected.
